welcomeCards.title: Code Analysis
welcomeCards.prompt: Analyze this codebase and provide insights on architecture, potential improvements, and code quality issues

welcomeCards.title: Bug Finder
welcomeCards.prompt: Help me find and fix bugs in my code. Scan for common issues, memory leaks, and security vulnerabilities

welcomeCards.title: API Documentation
welcomeCards.prompt: Generate comprehensive API documentation for my project including endpoints, request/response examples, and usage guides

welcomeCards.title: Research Assistant
welcomeCards.prompt: Help me research the latest trends and best practices in my field. Provide detailed analysis and recommendations

welcomeCards.title: Market Analysis
welcomeCards.prompt: Analyze market trends, competitor landscape, and provide strategic insights for business decision making

welcomeCards.title: Technical Writing
welcomeCards.prompt: Help me write clear, concise technical documentation, tutorials, and user guides

welcomeCards.title: Blog Post Creator
welcomeCards.prompt: Create engaging blog posts about technology, development practices, and industry insights

welcomeCards.title: Social Media Content
welcomeCards.prompt: Generate engaging social media content, posts, and campaigns for tech audiences

welcomeCards.title: Data Visualization
welcomeCards.prompt: Help me create compelling data visualizations and charts to present insights effectively

welcomeCards.title: Performance Metrics
welcomeCards.prompt: Analyze application performance metrics and provide optimization recommendations

welcomeCards.title: Learning Path
welcomeCards.prompt: Create a personalized learning path for new technologies and skills development

welcomeCards.title: Code Review
welcomeCards.prompt: Review my code for best practices, performance issues, and suggest improvements
